dict.acceptation: 使振作；操纵；给…配置人员；在…就位；

sent.orig: The word "man" is the antecedent of "who" in "the man who spoke".
sent.trans: "man"这个字是"the man who spoke"中"who"的先行词。

sent.orig: The corrosion inhibition of an unsatureated peroxide, MAN +BPO,for carbon steel in acid medium was explored.
sent.trans: 探讨了不饱和化合物——过氧体系、尤其是MAN+BPO对碳钢在酸性介质中的腐蚀抑制作用。

sent.orig: The man command is used to show you the manual of other commands.
sent.trans: man命令用来显示其它命令的手册页。

sent.orig: There are also info pages, which are generally more in-depth than man pages.
sent.trans: 还有一个就是info命令了，它通常比man还深入。

sent.orig: A MAN is actually a LAN of large size.
sent.trans: 一个城域网(MAN)实质上是规模较大的局域网。
